title: FastStore Schema
description: Collection of default schemas for FastStore.

value.title: PDP template value (e.g. Slug: /apple-magic-mouse/p OR /department/category/subcategory/)
value.description: Possible values: the PDP slug template (e.g. '/apple-magic-mouse/p'); A PLP template (e.g. '/department/' OR '/department/category/' OR '/department/category/subcategory/'). If empty, this template will be the generic PDP.

id.title: ID
id.description: A unique identifier used to reference the product page. This is a descriptive value (e.g., `#product`) that will be concatenated with the product path (example of the result: `/product-slug/p#product`).

mainEntityOfPage.title: Main entity of page
mainEntityOfPage.description: Indicates the main entity of the page. A unique identifier used to reference the product page. This is a descriptive value (e.g., `#webpage`) that will be concatenated with the product path (example of the result: `/product-slug/p#webpage`).

value.title: PLP template value (e.g. Slug: /department/category/subcategory)
value.description: PLP slug template (e.g. /office or /office/chairs) representing the /department/category/subcategory template). If this field is left empty, the generic PLP template will be applied.

title.title: Default page title
title.description: Display this title when no other tile is available

publisherId.title: Publisher ID
publisherId.description: A unique identifier used to reference the publisher. This can be a descriptive value (e.g., `#organization`) or a full URL (e.g., `https://example.com/publisher`).

id.title: Organization ID
id.description: A unique reference for the organization. This can be a descriptive value (e.g., #organization) or a full URL (e.g.,https://example.com/organization).

sameAs.title: Organization URLs
sameAs.description: The URL of a page on another website with additional information about your organization. For example, a URL to your organization's profile page on a social media or review site.

logo.title: Organization logo URL
logo.description: A logo that is representative of your organization. Image guidelines: https://developers.google.com/search/docs/appearance/structured-data/organization

image.title: Organization image/logo object
image.description: An image that is representative of your organization. Image guidelines: https://developers.google.com/search/docs/appearance/structured-data/organization

url.title: Organization image URL
url.description: The URL of the image. Make sure the url is crawlable and indexable.

caption.title: Organization image caption
caption.description: A short description of the image.

id.title: Organization image ID
id.description: A unique reference for the image. This can be a descriptive value (e.g., #logo) or a full URL (e.g.,https://example.com/logo).

email.title: Organization email
email.description: The email address to contact your business

telephone.title: Organization phone
telephone.description: A business phone number. Be sure to include the country code and area code in the phone number.

address.title: Organization address
address.description: The address (physical or mailing) of your organization, if applicable.

streetAddress.title: Street Address
streetAddress.description: The full street address of your postal address.

addressLocality.title: City
addressLocality.description: The city of your postal address.

addressCountry.title: Country
addressCountry.description: The country of your postal address. Recommended to be in 2-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format, for example 'BR','US'.

postalCode.title: Postal Code
postalCode.description: The postal code of your postal address.
